str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: From zelos; to have warmth of feeling for or against.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
Always, at all times, ever. From pas and hote; every when, i.e. At all times.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
Alone, but, only. Neuter of monos as adverb; merely.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
